fixedOption.explain:
Overall Damage +17%

Casts a barrier with 10% of Max HP every 10 sec.

Jump-landing generates a shock wave.
- This shock wave Stuns enemies for 3 sec. (Cooldown: 20 sec.)
- Inflicts 2,200% of total Atk. Increase.

Attack/Movement Speed +8%
Casting Speed +12%
